title: Anti-apoptotic treatment of warm ischemic male rat livers in machine perfusion improves symptoms of ischemia-reperfusion injury
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Mohammadreza Mojoudi, McLean S. Taggart, Anil Kharga, Huyun Chen, Antonia T. Dinicu, Benjamin T. Wilks, James F. Markmann, Mehmet Toner, Shannon N. Tessier, Heidi Yeh, Korkut Uygun
